document.full_text: charlie sheen's "torpedo of truth" live tour will explode onto 12 more stages across the united states and into canada, as reports surfaced on thursday of sold-out shows at new york's radio city music hall.
document.title: charlie sheen adds 12 more dates to live tour
lines_and_colors: charlie sheen's "torpedo of truth" live tour will explode onto 12 more stages across the united states and into canada, as reports surfaced on thursday of sold-out shows at new york's radio city music hall.
